short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your cursor into a pickaxe on x.com and mine for Eureka nuggets! Automatically highlights tweets with hidden treasures.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prospector for Eureka

Turn your X (formerly Twitter) browsing experience into a treasure hunt with Prospector! This extension transforms your cursor into a pickaxe when you're on x.com, allowing you to mine for valuable Eureka nuggets.

Key Features:
• Pickaxe Cursor: Your cursor becomes a pickaxe on x.com, adding a fun mining theme to your browsing.
• Automatic Tweet Highlighting: Tweets containing hidden Eureka nuggets are automatically highlighted, making them easy to spot.
• One-Click Mining: Simply click on a highlighted tweet to mine the nugget and claim your reward.
• Real-Time Updates: The extension regularly checks for new nugget-containing tweets, ensuring you never miss an opportunity.
• Seamless Integration: Works smoothly with x.com without disrupting your normal browsing experience.

Start your digital gold rush today with Prospector for Eureka!

Note: This extension requires a Eureka account to claim nuggets. Visit eureka.game to sign up and learn more about the Eureka ecosystem.
